ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: not an easy day for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and for the disbelievers, in particular, it will not be at all easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Far from easy for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: For the unbelievers, anything but easy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It will not be easy for those who deny the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: not at all easy for the faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Far from easy for those without Faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Far from easy for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and it will not be easy for the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:10] for the disbelievers, not at all easy: herein is an indication that it will be easy for believers despite its harshness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Not of ease, for disbelievers) i.e. its horrors and torment are not easy for the disbelievers.
